metadata.title: CVE-2019-10672 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
treeRead in hdf/btree.c in libmysofa before 0.7 does not properly validatemultiplications and additions.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-10672` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmysofa-utils - 0.6~dfsg0-2ubuntu0.18.04.1
libmysofa0 - 0.6~dfsg0-2ubuntu0.18.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libmysofa package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.6~dfsg0-2ubuntu0.18.04.1').
